steps.title: OpenStax Tutor homework
steps.body: A homework assignment includes questions you assign and up to four personalized questions assigned by OpenStax Tutor.

steps.title: Build a homework
steps.body: Ready to make a homework assignment? Fill in this form and click “select problems.”

steps.title: First, select a chapter
steps.body: Select a chapter you want to assign, then scroll down and click “show problems.” Uncheck any sections you don’t want to cover.

steps.title: Personalized questions
steps.body: OpenStax Tutor generates questions using machine learning algorithms that study a student’s performance. You can allow up to four, but no fewer than two personalized questions per homework assignment.
:best-practices: Don’t forget—exclude questions you don’t want your students to get before you publish an assignment. Questions can’t be removed after it’s published.

steps.title: How OpenStax Tutor selects questions
steps.body: Based on sections you assign and student performance, OpenStax Tutor selects questions that will help students improve their understanding of [the section or topic, depending on how we’re using those terms].

steps.title: Add questions
steps.body: To add a homework question, hover over the question and click “Add question.”
